name: @hyva-themes/magento2-default-theme
description: Hyvä-Themes Default Theme, a TailwindCSS and Alpine.js based Magento frontend theme that makes eCommerce happy.

scripts.watch: npm run watch-hyva && npm run watch-amrobots && npm run watch-finn
scripts.build: npm run build-hyva && npm run build-amrobots && npm run build-finn
scripts.clean-npm: npm config delete python && npm config delete python -g
scripts.clean-all: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean-all-and-install: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install

author: Hyvä Themes BV
